Name: Find Weakness α
Desc: Attacker Omniframes mark the targets when they attack,/n increasing DMG dealt to them by Support Omniframes.

Name: Find Weakness β
Desc: Attacker Omniframes mark the targets when they attack,/n increasing DMG dealt to them by Tank Omniframes.

Name: Lingering Signal
Desc: After a non-Attacker Omniframe pings Signal Orbs,\nthe next Omniframe entering battle will deal increased DMG.

Name: High Morale
Desc: After a non-Attacker Omniframe deals DMG,\nthe next Omniframe entering battle will deal increased DMG.

Name: Affix Name 5
Desc: Each time an enemy is attacked, it loses 2% Extra DMG Reduction. This effect has a cooldown of 1s before being triggered again.\nStacks up to 100%.

Name: Affix Name 6
Desc: The cooldown of Orb recovery from Basic Attacks is doubled.

Name: Affix Name 7
Desc: In Special Dispatch Zone, Basic Attacks recover Orbs at a slower rate.\nAfter dealing DMG, the next Omniframe that enters battle will gain Signal Orbs.

Name: Affix Name 8
Desc: Basic Attacks recover Orbs at a slower rate.\nWhen healed, team members can gain Signal Orbs.

Name: Affix Name 9
Desc: In Special Dispatch Zone, the cooldown of QTE is reduced.\nQTE also recovers additional Orbs for the current character in battle.

Name: Affix Name 10
Desc: In Special Dispatch Zone, Basic Attacks recover Orbs at a slower rate.\nBasic Attacks deal extra DMG 1 time when they hit.

Name: Affix Name 11
Desc: In Special Dispatch Zone, the cooldown of QTE is extended.\nWhile the cooldown of switching between members is reduced.

Name: Affix Name 12
Desc: QTE cooldown increases by 6s.

Name: Affix Name 13
Desc: In Special Dispatch Zone, Basic Attacks recover Orbs at a slower rate.\nWhen gaining a shield, team members can gain Signal Orbs.

Name: Affix Name 14
Desc: In Special Dispatch Zone, after the current character uses a CUB skill\nHe or she will deal increased DMG over the next 5s.

Name: Affix Name 15
Desc: Signature Move consumes all available energy\nAnd deals increased damage based on the energy consumed.

Name: Affix Name 16
Desc: Gain 9 bonus Signal Orbs each time when a new character is switched into battle.

Name: Affix Name 17
Desc: Character's shield capacity and healing effect increase by 100%.

Name: Affix Name 18
Desc: Character's shield capacity and healing effect increase by 100%.

Name: Affix Name 19
Desc: The energy cost of Signature Move is reduced by 50%.

Name: Affix Name 20
Desc: After character switch, the character that is switched into battle gains 10% Extra DMG Bonus.\nThis effect lasts permanently and stacks up to 150%.

Name: Berserk 1
Desc: The enemy's attacking desire increases by 33%. When dealing DMG, there is a 20% chance to deal 33% Extra DMG.

Name: Berserk 2
Desc: The enemy's attacking desire increases by 66%. When dealing DMG, there is a 40% chance to deal 33% Extra DMG.

Name: Berserk 3
Desc: The enemy's attacking desire increases by 100%. When dealing DMG, there is a 60% chance to deal 33% Extra DMG.

Name: Assault 1
Desc: Enemies gain 10% more Attack.

Name: Assault 2
Desc: Enemies gain 20% more Attack.

Name: Assault 3
Desc: Enemies gain 30% more Attack.

Name: Lightning Mine
Desc: Enemy attacks plant a bomb on their target that detonates after some time, dealing Physical DMG equal to 15% of their ATK.

Name: Radiation 1
Desc: The enemy will deal Physical DMG equal to 1% of its ATK to nearby targets per second.

Name: Radiation 2
Desc: The enemy will deal Physical DMG equal to 2% of its ATK to nearby targets per second.

Name: Radiation 3
Desc: The enemy will deal Physical DMG equal to 3% of its ATK to nearby targets per second.

Name: Lightning Shield
Desc: Every time the enemy gets hit, there is a 10% chance to call down a lightning strike upon the attacker (5s cooldown), dealing Lightning DMG equal to 20% of its ATK.

Name: Shield 1
Desc: Every 8s, enemies will gain a shield equal to 15% of maximum HP for 3s.

Name: Shield 2
Desc: Every 8s, enemies will gain a shield equal to 25% of max HP for 3s.

Name: Shield 3
Desc: Every 8s, enemies will gain a shield equal to 35% of max HP for 3s.

Name: Barrier 1
Desc: Enemies have shields that absorb up to 15% of max HP before shattering.

Name: Barrier 2
Desc: Enemies have shields that absorb up to 25% of max HP before shattering.

Name: Barrier 3
Desc: Enemies have shields that absorb up to 35% of max HP before shattering.

Name: Closed Loop 1
Desc: The enemy's Extra DMG Reduction increases by 30% when taking DMG from more than 4m away.

Name: Closed Loop 2
Desc: The enemy's Extra DMG Reduction increases by 45% when taking DMG from more than 4m away.

Name: Closed Loop 3
Desc: The enemy's Extra DMG Reduction increases by 60% when taking DMG from more than 4m away.

Name: Dynamic Calibration 1
Desc: Th enemy recovers 1% of max HP per second. This effect is reduced from 1% to 0.4% for 2s after taking DMG.

Name: Dynamic Calibration 2
Desc: Th enemy recovers 2% of max HP per second. This effect is reduced from 2% to 0.8% within 2s after taking DMG.

Name: Dynamic Calibration 3
Desc: Th enemy recovers 3% of max HP per second. This effect is reduced from 3% to 1.2% within 2s after taking DMG.

Name: Black Hole 1
Desc: The enemy will pull the player in every 16s.

Name: Black Hole 2
Desc: The enemy will pull the player in every 12s.

Name: Black Hole 3
Desc: The enemy will pull the player in every 8s.

Name: Flash 1
Desc: The enemy will teleport toward the target every 10s.

Name: Flash 2
Desc: The enemy will teleport toward the target every 10s.

Name: Flash 3
Desc: The enemy will teleport toward the target every 10s.

Name: Freeze
Desc: Each attack has a 30% chance to deal an additional 10% Ice DMG and freeze the target for 1s.

Name: Immovable
Desc: Enemies will not be stunned.

Name: Penetration
Desc: Each time the enemy hits the player, player loses 3% DEF for 10s, stacking up to 10 times.

Name: Agile
Desc: The enemy's Movement Speed is increased.

Name: Blessing
Desc: Extra DMG Bonus of other enemies around the enemy increases by 20%.

Name: Bomb
Desc: The enemy will explode and deal Physical DMG equal to 45% of its ATK to nearby units before it dies.

Name: Agile
Desc: The enemy's Movement Speed is increased.

Name: Blessing
Desc: Extra DMG Bonus of other enemies around the enemy increases by 20%.

Desc: ATK of enemies in Simulated Battle increases by 20%.

Desc: Enemies have shields that absorb up to 25% of max HP before shattering.

Desc: The enemy will deal Physical DMG equal to 2% of its ATK to nearby targets per second.

Desc: All team members enter the battle. You may choose to control any character at any time.

Desc: Cooldown of switching between members in Special Dispatch Zone is extended.\nTeam members become enhanced as they stay in the battle longer. This effect is reset each time a new player is switched into battle.

Desc: Damage dealt also reduces target's healing received by 50% for 3s.

Name: Deterioration 2
Desc: Damage dealt also reduces target's healing received by 60% for 4s.

Name: Affix Name 7
Desc: After reaching a combo number that is a multiplier of 50, launch laser to hit all enemy targets\ndealing 100,000 True Damage

Name: Logistic Support
Desc: Increases the limit time of Deep Hive by 30s after clearing this stage.

Name: Abnormal Units
Desc: The 2nd enemy of the 1st wave is enhanced, and its death increases the ATK and HP of all enemies by 50%.

Name: Severely Corrupted
Desc: The 1st enemy of the 1st Wave is enhanced, gaining Commander and Blessing Bonus, and increases HP limit by 50%.

Name: Sacrifice
Desc: After 20s of combat, a special Missionary will be summoned. It will gradually approach the enemy unit and deduct its own Health to restore it and it will be summoned every 30s (There's only one Missionary on the field)

Name: Stress Reaction
Desc: After a character deals DMG to the enemy, 1 Baneling is generated nearby, 8s Cooldown.

Name: Light Punishment
Desc: 1 beam of Main Laser is generated on the field which tracks your units, and is enhanced every 30s. Enter Overload state 180s later, the enhancement interval reduces to 5s.

Name: Light Sensitivity
Desc: After clearing this stage, the Deep Hive's Main Laser Overload time delays for 30s.

Name: High-Energy Rig
Desc: Main Laser increases DMG by 30%.

Name: Fire Net
Desc: 2 beams of Secondary Lasers are generated on the field. They move closer to your units every 1s and has a fixed speed and DMG.

Name: Singularity
Desc: 26s after the start of the Battle, the field unit unleashes one Dark Explosion, shortening the next unleash interval by 2s, increasing DMG by 10%.

Name: Catalytic Unit
Desc: After clearing this stage, the time for the first Dark Explosion unleashed from the Deep Hive's field unit delays to 28s.

Name: Hysteria
Desc: Adds 10% of Extra DMG Bonus to all enemy units in field after each Dark Explosion (excluding itself).

Name: Energy Gathering
Desc: Unleashes Black Hole which draws in our units before each Dark Explosion.

Desc: Attacks deal an additional 15% Fire DMG and have a 15% chance to inflict Burn, dealing 15% Fire DMG per second for 3s.

Name: Pure Site
Desc: Damage by Uniframes reduces more Finisher Gauge value.

Name: Assault 2
Desc: Enemy's Extra DMG Bonus increases by 45%.

Name: Berserk 2
Desc: The enemy's attacking desire increases by 66%. When dealing DMG, there is a 40% chance to deal 33% Extra DMG.

Name: Emergency Device

Name: Burn
Desc: The enemy's damage also causes allies to Burn, losing HP every second over 5s.

Name: Deterioration 2
Desc: Damage dealt also reduces target's healing received by 60% for 4s.

Name: Penetration 2
Desc: Each time the enemy hits the player, player loses 4% DEF for 10s, stacking up to 10 times.

Name: Inner Force
Desc: The max HP of enemies increases by 10%.

Name: Bomb
Desc: Upon death, the enemies will lay a mine where they stand that explodes after a short delay, dealing damage.

Name: Destructive Beam
Desc: 30s after the start of battle, 1 laser device will appear to launch laser at ally units every 20s. After each shot, the laser has its interval reduced by 2s and deals 10% more damage.

Name: Enhanced Charging Base
Desc: The warning time of laser device decreases by 33%.

Name: Cross Fire
Desc: One additional laser device will appear in battle.

Name: Signal Dark Field
Desc: After clearing this stage, the laser device in Deep Hive will appear 30s later.

Name: Hive
Desc: 30s after the start of battle, 2 Jitterbombs will appear. The interval is reduced by 2s each time and 1 more Jitterbomb will appear (up to 4).

Name: Pheromone
Desc: Jitterbomb now moves and explodes 100% faster.

Name: Singularity Mark
Desc: Jitterbomb initiates a Dark Burst when not dying from self-destruction.

Name: Logistic Support
Desc: Increases the limit time of Deep Hive by 30s after clearing this stage.

Name: Electromagnetization
Desc: Enemies inflict Lightning DMG equal to 20% ATK upon dealing damage

Name: Super Lightning Field
Desc: Generate multiple rounds of vertical and diagonal lightnings around the target every 8s

Name: Dominator
Desc: Enemies are immune to Matrix effects.

Name: Energy Loss
Desc: Upon receiving Lightning DMG, the character loses 20 Dodge and 20 Energy within 4s.

Name: Iron Shield
Desc: Enemies have a shield equal to 10% max HP upon deployment. The shield will not be refreshed.

Name: Ruler
Desc: There will be two more Primes on the field to assist the enemies in battle.

Name: War Drum α
Desc: The assistant Primes provide the enemies with 2 buffs when on the field: Assult 3 and DMG Immunity 3

Name: Undying
Desc: The assistant Primes will revive 20s after death

Name: Wound Healing
Desc: The assistant Primes restore 1% of max HP per second

Name: Overwhelming Power
Desc: The assistant Primes gain a 10% Extra DMG Bonus

Name: Ascendant Watcher
Desc: Alpha will watch over the field. She will fire 1 swordwave 33s after the battle starts. Meanwhile, she will reduce the firing interval by 3s and increase swordwave damage by 10%. Swordwaves +1 every 3 rounds.

Name: Blade Edge
Desc: Base swordwave damage increases by 20%

Name: Blade Wave
Desc: Swordwaves +1 upon first wave fired

Name: Blade Shadow
Desc: Upon fired, swordwave(s) will inflict 1 hit of swordwave(s) on each side, which deal 20% of the original damage

Name: Blade Fang
Desc: Swordwaves will deal Extra DMG equal to 100% of their damage and reduce healing by 25% within 5s after hitting the target. The effect can be stacked.

Name: Limiter Release
Desc: Every after character switch: \nCharacter on the field has permanent 20% Extra DMG Bonus (up to 200%)\nCharacter on the field gains Super Armor and a shield equal to 30% max HP within 15s.

Name: Vision Event
Desc: A black hole will appear on the battlefield at intervals.\nThe black hole will pull in enemies within a large area over time.

Name: Operation Uniframe
Desc: Upon taking Uniframe DMG, greatly reduces the Finisher Gauge. Speed Attack Skills' bonus effects will not be affected (not shown).

Name: Final Countdown
Desc: After the battle starts, a flame will appear on the battlefield every 9s, which will deal Fire DMG to allies it touches. After the 20th flame is summoned, the flames will start tracking your allies.

Name: Ceremony Preparation
Desc: After the stage is cleared, each flame summoned will shrink over time and start to track your 30s later.

Name: Nowhere to Hide
Desc: The flames' damage cannot be dodged.

Name: Scorching Flame
Desc: Flame deals 200% more DMG.

Name: Celestial Beam
Desc: The laser beam is fired once per 20s and gains more DMG and tracking power as the character stays in battle for a longer duration. This enhancement is reset when another character is switched into battle.

Name: Double Threat
Desc: The number of tracking lasers increases by 1.

Name: Blockade
Desc: Characters recover Dodge Gauge 30% slower.

Name: Saturation Airstrike
Desc: Fires a large number of missiles to the character every 20s. The number of missiles increases over time.

Name: Armor Corruption
Desc: After being hit by a missile, character takes 5% more DMG for 5s. This duration is refreshed if character is hit by missiles again, stacking up to 20 times.

Name: Dust of Destruction
Desc: Character's Movement Speed decreases by 20%, HP Recovery decreases by 60%.

Name: Surging Red Tide
Desc: Creates a Red Tide Fountain to damage characters within range continuously and knock them away at the end. This effect is triggered once every 10s.

Name: Hands of the Dead
Desc: While Red Tide Fountain lasts, it will continuously pull characters toward the center of the Red Tide.

Name: Red Dominator
Desc: Enemies will be immune to Matrix effects.

Name: All Stats Check +10%
Desc: The other Elemental DMG increases by 10%.

Name: Ice, Lightning, Dark, Nihil +10%
Desc: Ice, Lightning, Dark, and Nihil DMG increases by 10%.

Name: Lightning, Dark, Physical, Nihil +10%
Desc: Lightning, Dark, Physical, and Nihil DMG increases by 10%.

Name: Dark, Physical, Fire, Nihil +10%
Desc: Dark, Physical, Fire, and Nihil DMG increases by 10%.

Name: Physical, Fire, Ice, Nihil +10%
Desc: Physical, Fire, Ice, and Nihil DMG increases by 10%.

Name: Fire, Ice, Lightning, Nihil +10%
Desc: Fire, Ice, Lightning, and Nihil DMG increases by 10%.

Name: Lightning, Dark, Nihil +20%
Desc: Lightning, Dark, and Nihil DMG increases by 20%.

Name: Dark, Physical, Nihil +20%
Desc: Lightning, Physical, and Nihil DMG increases by 20%.

Name: Physical, Fire, Nihil +20%
Desc: Physical, Fire, Nihil DMG increases by 20%.

Name: Fire, Ice, Nihil +20%
Desc: Fire, Ice, and Nihil DMG increases by 20%.

Name: Ice, Lightning, Nihil +20%
Desc: Ice, Lightning, and Nihil DMG increases by 20%.

Name: Physical, Nihil +20%
Desc: Physical and Nihil DMG increases by 20%.

Name: Fire, Nihil +20%
Desc: Fire and Nihil DMG increases by 20%.

Name: Ice, Nihil +20%
Desc: Ice and Nihil DMG increases by 20%.

Name: Lightning, Nihil +20%
Desc: Lightning and Nihil DMG increases by 20%.

Name: Dark, Nihil +20%
Desc: Dark and Nihil DMG increases by 20%.

Name: Dimensional Vortex
Desc: The enemy's HP increase significantly. Upon entering the battlefield, your members an 80% ATK Bonus for 8s, which will disappear gradually 8s later.

Name: Gradual Underlocking
Desc: The ATK bonus provided by Dimensional Vortex lasts 4 fewer seconds and decreases at a faster speed.

Name: Perfect Rotation Switch ATK Boost
Desc: The ATK bonus provided by Dimensional Vortex doubles and lasts for 4 more seconds.\nThe effect decreases at a slower speed.\nPlayer gains 30% DMG Reduction during the effect of Dimensional Vortex.

Name: Dominator
Desc: Enemies are immune to Matrix effects.

Name: Overloading Frequencies
Desc: Enemies will accumulate energy over time. Once energy is full, they will enter the Overclocking State and gain the Rift Tunnel Effect. Enemies will gain bonus energy when they deal DMG and lose energy when they take DMG.

Name: Rift Tunnel
Desc: Enemies will gain Dominance and Radiation in the Overclocking State, ignore Matrix and deal continuous DMG to targets around them.

Name: Energy Resonance
Desc: The energy accumulation efficiency of enemies is increased by 50%, and they will also gain 50% more energy from dealing DMG.

Name: Rippling Quake
Desc: Enemies will deal higher Radiation DMG in the Overclocking State.

Name: Temporary Configuration
Desc: Flame deals 200% more DMG.
